qas.question: When are many passes in the Alps closed?
The lower regions and larger towns of the Alps are well-served by what?
What can be treacherous even in summer due to steep slopes?

context: The lower regions and larger towns of the Alps are well-served by <a1_0>motorways<a1_0/> and main roads, but higher <a2_0>mountain passes<a2_0/> and byroads, which are amongst the highest in Europe, can be treacherous even in summer due to steep slopes. Many passes are closed in <a0_0>winter<a0_0/>. A multitude of airports around the Alps (and some within), as well as long-distance rail links from all neighbouring countries, afford large numbers of travellers easy access from abroad.
